page.title: 03FARMING ,Gipsey Bridge
page.content: The farms in our area are a mixture of tenancies and owner- farmers.The largest farm in our area is part of a larger farming company, and employs about 11 men and a few students. The farmer considers that they are conservationists and look after the wildlife of the area.They worry most about the weather. The 2 seasons they like best are springtime when every thing grow and summer when they combine the crops. The EEC has made a difference with the farms ,it gives subsidies although there were some before joining the EEC. Farming has changed a great deal over the years, we have entered the mechanical age .Horses have gone and most of the men because of the machinery ,they had 18 horses on the farm 18 years ago now there are none.
